explains: n. （无休止的）指责；（长篇）抨击，谴责

sentences.en: The book is a diatribe against the academic left.
sentences.cn: 该书是对学术左派的抨击。

sentences.en: He launched a bitter diatribe against the younger generation.
sentences.cn: 他对年轻一代发起了猛烈的抨击。

sentences.en: At times it is little more than a self-serving diatribe.
sentences.cn: 有时这就是一个供自我谩骂发泄的平台。
